ingredients: 1 cup fresh pineapple, diced (or canned, drained)
Optional: salsa, hot sauce, radishes, avocado
steps: Warm tortillas on a griddle or directly over a gas flame
Fill tortillas with cooked protein and caramelized pineapple
Top with diced onion, fresh cilantro, and a squeeze of lime
Serve with additional lime wedges and optional toppings
title: Al Pastor-Style Tacos
